Fear.name: Fear
Fear.text: Creatures and people flee for 30 seconds

Fortify Alteration.name: Fortify Alteration
Fortify Alteration.text: Alteration spells last longer for 60 seconds

Fortify Barter.name: Fortify Barter
Fortify Barter.text: You haggle for better prices for 30 seconds

Fortify Block.name: Fortify Block
Fortify Block.text: Blocking absorbs more damage for 60 seconds

Fortify Conjuration.name: Fortify Conjuration
Fortify Conjuration.text: Conjuration spells last longer for 60 seconds

Fortify Destruction.name: Fortify Destruction
Fortify Destruction.text: Destruction spells deal more damage for 60 seconds

Fortify Enchanting.name: Fortify Enchanting
Fortify Enchanting.text: For 30 seconds items are enchanted stronger

Fortify Heavy Armor.name: Fortify Heavy Armor
Fortify Heavy Armor.text: Increase Heavy Armor skill for 60 seconds

Fortify Illusion.name: Fortify Illusion
Fortify Illusion.text: Illusion spells are stronger for 60 seconds

Fortify Light Armor.name: Fortify Light Armor
Fortify Light Armor.text: Increases Light Armor skill for 60 seconds

Fortify Marksman.name: Fortify Marksman
Fortify Marksman.text: Bows do more damage for 60 seconds

Fortify One Handed.name: Fortify One Handed
Fortify One Handed.text: One-handed weapons do more damage for 60 seconds

Fortify Restoration.name: Fortify Restoration
Fortify Restoration.text: Restoration spells are stronger for 60 seconds

Fortify Smithing.name: Fortify Smithing
Fortify Smithing.text: For 30 seconds weapon and armor improving is better

Fortify Sneak.name: Fortify Sneak
Fortify Sneak.text: You are harder to detect for 60 seconds

Fortify Two Handed.name: Fortify Two Handed
Fortify Two Handed.text: Two-handed weapons do more damage for 60 seconds

Frenzy.name: Frenzy
Frenzy.text: Creatures and people will attack anything nearby for 10 seconds

Lingering Damage Magicka.name: Lingering Damage Magicka
Lingering Damage Magicka.text: Drains the target's Magicka for 10 seconds

Lingering Damage Stamina.name: Lingering Damage Stamina
Lingering Damage Stamina.text: Drain the target's Stamina for 10 seconds

Weakness to Fire.name: Weakness to Fire
Weakness to Fire.text: Target is weaker to fire damage for 30 seconds

Weakness to Frost.name: Weakness to Frost
Weakness to Frost.text: Target is weaker to frost damage for 30 seconds

Weakness to Magic.name: Weakness to Magic
Weakness to Magic.text: Target is weaker to magic for 30 seconds

Weakness to Poison.name: Weakness to Poison
Weakness to Poison.text: Target is weaker to poison damage for 30 seconds

Weakness to Shock.name: Weakness to Shock
Weakness to Shock.text: Target is weaker to shock damage for 30 seconds
